thread.section_title: Euroflorist Norge omtaler | Kundenes anmeldelser av Euroflorist Norge | euroflorist.no
thread.title: Darren

author: Darren
title: Darren
text:
I ordered flowers for my friends birthday. Being that I've never ordered flowers to be delivered outside of England I was a bit sceptical that they would be delivered let alone on time.
Thankfully my scepticism was unfounded, the flowers were delivered on time, I got a message from the supplier informing that the were being delivered and my friend was very happy with the flowers that arrived.
All in all a great result, Would definetly recommend.
